articles.description: West Ham midfielder Lucas Paqueta is being investigated by the Football Association for potential betting rule breaches, sources confirm to the BBC.
articles.title: Paqueta investigated over potential betting breaches

articles.description: Chris Wood heads home the winner as Nottingham Forest beat Sheffield United at the City Ground.
articles.title: Wood heads late Forest winner against Sheff Utd

articles.description: Sarina Wiegman says she has "no plans to leave" her job as England manager and intends to see out the rest of her contract, which lasts until 2025.
articles.title: Wiegman has 'no plans to leave' England job

articles.description: England captain Harry Kane scores and sets up a goal on his Bundesliga debut as champions Bayern Munich record a thumping win at Werder Bremen.
articles.title: Kane scores on Bundesliga debut in Bayern victory

articles.description: Watch some of the best moments and goals from all of England's games on the road to Sunday's Women's World Cup final where they will take on Spain in Sydney.
articles.title: England's road to the Women's World Cup final

articles.description: Ravi Bopara takes 4-21 as London Spirit claim a crucial 13-run win over Northern Superchargers in The Hundred.
articles.title: Bopara stars with ball as Spirit beat Superchargers

articles.description: Luke Ayling heads the Leeds United equaliser to cancel out Brandon Thomas-Asante's controversial opener for West Bromwich Albion.
articles.title: Ayling leveller earns Leeds draw against Baggies

articles.description: Briton Dennis McCann's super-bantamweight contest against Ionut Baluta ended in a majority draw after an accidental clash of heads.
articles.title: McCann draws with Baluta after head clash

articles.description: Second-placed Wigan fight back late to pip Hull on golden-point after a dramatic finish at the DW Stadium
articles.title: Wigan sink Hull with golden-point win

articles.description: Watch Friday's best plays in The Hundred at Lord's including a stunning catch from Nathan Ellis, Daryl Mitchell's big six, and a one-handed catch from Richa Ghosh.
articles.title: Ellis's diving catch leads plays of the day
